item.title: Run your own Ghost blog on OpenShift
item.description: Easy peasy: Create a free OpenShift account Setup your environment Run the following command: rhc app create ghost nodejs-0.10 --env NODE_ENV=production --from-code https://github.com/openshift-quickstart/openshift-ghost-quickstart.git Profit Check this quickstart for more information, and the awesome OpenShift documentation
